  • what's this?

  • Welcome to trademarkhell.net, the designated dumping ground for my ramblings, thoughts, and rambling thoughts. I mostly just use this site to publish my pseudo-essays on various topics, predominantly relating to my interests.

    I unfortunately haven't yet thought of a pretentious way to describe my site as a internet utopia which will change the world, so the best I can do is a philisophical quote generator, which I'll attach below. Thank me for my boundless wisdom later.

    loading...

    Anyways, click around the site if you want, there's probably cool stuff (if page long essays about useless things are considered cool nowadays)

  • what's new?

        • My Pointless Web Design Pet Peaves // 17 August 2024
          Just yesterday I recognized that my web and article sections were nearly identical, unfortunately, this will be keeping that trend going, as I'll be ranting about web design elements I dislike. This article is solely based on my opinions, and the evidence used is fringe at best. Deeply scientific stuff.
        • Local Car Culture as Viewed by an Idiot // 17 August 2024
          As I was adding the 'web' tag to my site I realized that my web section and blog section were identical, so I figured I should talk about something new. Here it is, an article about shoddily put together vehicles predominently owned by secondary school students. I literally have no idea who will read this, it sounded more interesting in my head. This article has no real meaning, and there'll still be another article today.
